# se-block-footer

| Slot  | Description                                                             |
| ----- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| none  | Slot with no name will be positioned to the start of the element (left) |
| `end` | Positions to the `right` of the content.                                |

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                                                                       | Type                            | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `direction` | `direction` | Defines the direction of the flex element. `row` is the default direction. This is perfect to use with flex content. `column` is useful in specific cases. Make sure you know what you are doing. | `"column" \| "row"`             | `"row"`     |
| `option`    | `option`    | Defines the visual appearance of a footer. Updated automatically by the `se-block` component when on card option. `card` will update the design of the footer with respect to the card design.    | `"basic" \| "card" \| "widget"` | `undefined` |
